intent_atoms.description: Future developers can wire FoundationUI components into ISOInspector features (C21, C22) using documented integration patterns.
Added "FoundationUI Integration" section to 03_Technical_Spec.md or created new file.
Documented architecture patterns for wrapping FoundationUI components such as Badge, Card, KeyValueRow.
Provided code examples for Badge integration with ISOInspector state, Card layout patterns for detail panes, and KeyValueRow usage for metadata display.
Documented design token usage (DS.Spacing, DS.Colors, DS.Typography, etc.).
Created "Do's and Don'ts" guidelines for consistency.
Referenced existing test suite and ComponentTestApp in documentation.
Cross-linked from relevant PRDs and README sections.
Documentation reviewed for clarity and correctness with no broken references.
Design tokens must be used for spacing, colors, typography when styling FoundationUI components.
Wrap FoundationUI components in custom wrappers to adapt them to ISOInspector state and Combine/SwiftUI previews.
Use snapshot tests to validate component rendering.
